issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
This causes the op to fail.

To fix this, show all the subnets, but once one an an AZ is selected, the others in that same AZ should still be displayed (so the user knows they exist) but should be gray text and unselectable. If the first one in an AZ is deselected, all should become selectable again
fields.summary: On scaling group wizard VPC subnets, user should not be able to choose >1 in same AZ

comments.body:
Pull request has been created for UX review at:

https://github.com/eucalyptus/eucaconsole/pull/970

hi [~kyolee] I can't review this ATM because our AWS account only has the general VPC and it only has one subnet. I'm happy to do this via screen share if you'd like to show me on your local dev machine so we can move this ticket through, just come find me.

[~jloza] try the N.California region which has multiple VPC networks with multiple VPC subnets setup. Plus, more VPC networks and VPC subnets can be configured using the AWS management console:

http://docs.aws.amazon.com/workspaces/latest/adminguide/gsg_create_vpc.html#d0e4601
[~kyolee] either none of those networks have subnets in different regions or something is wrong witht he code, I can't find any, and the selector seems to be single select.
[~jloza] See the attachment for the screenshot of the create scaling group wizard page on N.california region of our AWS account.
[~kyolee] I see something completely different. Attaching screenshot. Please ping me so we can screen share.

[~kyolee] this looks good but I noticed on the scaling group detail page the subnet displays do not include the region and so you can't tell why they are grayed out. Can you format these like the other subnets you did in the other PR, please? 

Also, I get a no subnets found message in the chosen widget on the scaling group details page as well, screenshot attached.

The second attachment is on the instance launch wizard which only allows one VPC subnet to be specified. This ticket is for the scaling group wizard where you can list more than one VPC subnet. 

Another ticket, GUI-1310, has been filed to track the VPC subnet detail page issue.

Changed the title of the issue to be specific to the create scaling group wizard.

The same issue on the scaling group detail page will be tracked by the ticket GUI-1310.

Pull request is ready for UX review at:

https://github.com/eucalyptus/eucaconsole/pull/970

Nice job, [~kyolee]!

UX review passed, ready for code review.
